function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"COVID-19 causing a decline in international visitor arrivals and tourism receipts","Impact":"Loss of revenue and potential layoff of 50 million people in the tourism industry","Mitigation":"Implementing strict health and safety measures, promoting local tourism, and diversifying revenue sources","Technologies":"Digital health passports, contactless technologies, and sanitation technologies","People":"Workers in the tourism industry, local communities reliant on tourism, and global economy","Owner":"Governments, tourism industry associations, and individual businesses"},{"Description":"Drastic decline in global oil demand due to shutdown of international and domestic passenger aircraft","Impact":"Sharp decline in oil demand leading to plummeting oil prices and financial strain on the oil industry","Mitigation":"Diversifying into renewable energy, reducing production, and exploring new markets","Technologies":"Renewable energy technologies, advanced drilling technologies, and energy-efficient processes","People":"Workers in the oil industry, oil companies, and global energy markets","Owner":"Oil companies, governments, and industry regulators"}]}
